channel.name: OBIB Services
channel.description: - Receive JSON messages via REST API ["HTTP Listener" source connector] - Route the messages to the appropriate destination connector according to the REST path ["Destination Set Filter" source transformer] - Transform the JSON messages to BCCDA documents ["Javascript" destination transformers] - Send the HL7 messages to CDX WebServices using the CDXConnector Java Library ["Javascript Writer" destination connector]

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Get Clinic Credentials
Check Connector Version
Get Receivers
Header Attributes
Record Target (Patient Identifiers)
Author
Custodian
Information Recipient
Data Enterer
Authenticator
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script:
// 4.2.8. Authenticator and Legal Authenticator - Optional - 0..*
// CONF-BC0096 TODO ? Authenticator is the person or persons who attest to the content of the document.

com.mirth.connect.model.IteratorRule.name: Accept message if at least one of the iterations returns true for each msg['subject1']['assignedEntity']['performance']['actDefinitionOrEvent']['location']
